definition: Bulgaria/Bulgarian/abbr. for 保加利亞|保加利亚[Bao3 jia1 li4 ya4]
to defend/to protect/to keep/to guarantee/to ensure/civil administration unit in the baojia 保甲[bao3 jia3] system (old)

(after a verb or adjective) one who (is) .../(after a noun) person involved in .../-er/-ist/(used after a number or 後|后[hou4] or 前[qian2] to refer to sth mentioned previously)/(used after a term, to mark a pause before defining the term)/(old) (used at the end of a command)/(old) this

sentences.english: For any whom Allah leaves astray, there is no protector thereafter.
sentences.chinese: 真主使谁迷误，在真主的弃绝后，谁没有任何保护者。

sentences.english: And let the healing angels become your guardians.
sentences.chinese: 让医病天使成为你们的保护者吧。

sentences.english: Libertarians are the dhimmis of democracy.
sentences.chinese: 自由主义者是民主的受保护者。

sentences.english: Heydrich was appointed Protector of Bohemia and Moravia.
sentences.chinese: 海德里希被任命为波希米亚和摩拉维亚的保护者。

sentences.english: The third, called “protectionists,” strive to be the animal’s advocate.
sentences.chinese: 第三类被称为“保护者”，为保护动物奔走疾呼。

sentences.english: Most belay accidents are caused through failure of the belayer.
sentences.chinese: 大多数固定保护绳事故都是由于保护者的失误造成的。

sentences.english: He is our help and our shield .
sentences.chinese: 他是我们的帮助者和保护者。

sentences.english: Maecenas was twice left in virtual control of Rome when the emperor was away.
sentences.chinese: 保护者两次留在虚拟控制罗马当皇帝了。

sentences.english: There is only the kaname madoka, and she is our shield and protector.
sentences.chinese: 仅有小圆是我们唯一的庇护与保护者。

sentences.english: One promising profession that's emerging this century is wildlife preservationist.
sentences.chinese: 本世纪一个很有前途的新兴职业是野生动物保护者。

sentences.english: Hoping for anti-oxidization protection at the same time.
sentences.chinese: 希望同时做到抗氧化保护者。

sentences.english: Standoffs between protesters and hunters quickly boil over into arguments and threats.
sentences.chinese: 保护者和捕猎者之间的沟通很快演变成争吵和恐吓。

sentences.english: The Sea Shepherd group has emerged as one of the most aggressive anti-whaling organizations.
sentences.chinese: 海洋保护者协会是近年来出现的最激进的反捕鲸组织。

definition: to consider oneself as/to believe oneself to be
